programme.title: Black Hawk Down
Pad crnog jastreba
programme.desc: Black Hawk Down: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore, Eric Bana. The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0265086/","name":"Black Hawk Down","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWMwMzQxZjQtODM1YS00YmFiLTk1YjQtNzNiYWY1MDE4NTdiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDYyMDk5MTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0265086/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DesbUK"},"dateCreated":"2005-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A very American war story directed by an Englishman","reviewBody":"I've been watching this movie and its accompanying extras on DVD this week for the first time and I thought is ironic that this very American war story should be directed and produced by an Englishman (Ridley Scott) and have a large number of British actors cast as the American servicemen (Ewan McGregor, Jasson Issacs, Hugh Dancy, Euan Bremner, Orlando Bloom.) I suppose it's the equivalent of Steven Spielberg directing a film about the Battle of Goose Green during the Falklands War and casting Americans as members of the Parachute Regiment.\n\nScott's movie is quite brave in that it has no major stars and no central character (unlike, say Tom Hanks in SAVING PRIVATE RYAN or Mel Gibson in WHEN WE WERE SOLDIERS). It's also largely free of the clichés of the genre: no soaring John Williams score accompanying shots of the flag fluttering in the sunlight; no scenes of the families back home. Instead its all about the logistics and the absolute horror of battle. This is the best combat footage since ZULU way back in 1964, a film which it resembles. In Scott's commentary description words, it is 'Anti-War but pro-military'.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":379572,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","History","War"],"datePublished":"2002-03-27","keywords":"somalia,u.s. army,gunfight,peacekeeper,chaos","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Black Hawk Down","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1809188377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRkODRmMDEtYmI3Ni00MmQ4LWI2NDktYzY2ZDc2MmE5NTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRkODRmMDEtYmI3Ni00MmQ4LWI2NDktYzY2ZDc2MmE5NTZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Black Hawk Down"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001326/","name":"Josh Hartnett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000191/","name":"Ewan McGregor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001744/","name":"Tom Sizemore"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026281/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0100736/","name":"Mark Bowden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0634307/","name":"Ken Nolan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wushu
Wushu
programme.desc: Wushu: Directed by Antony Szeto. With Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Fengchao Liu, Wenjie Wang, Phoebe Wang. Ten years ago, five students joined a martial arts school and learned the disciplines of Wushu and the bonds of friendship. Today, both will be put to the test after they and a former student stumble into a child kidnapping ring." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0790786/","name":"Wushu","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5MjAzMjUwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTM0Mjg0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ten years ago, five students joined a martial arts school and learned the disciplines of Wushu and the bonds of friendship. Today, both will be put to the test after they and a former student stumble into a child kidnapping ring.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0790786/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rob14666"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is Entertainment!","reviewBody":"There's been a lot of hype about this film, and as a fan of kung fu films I've been looking forward to seeing it. The other thing that made me interested is the director, Antony Szeto, cause I saw his first film Dragon Blade in the theaters. Dragon Blade was a kid's computer animated film but the martial arts action in it is far more superior to the jumping around camera shots used for the fights in Kung Fu Panda. And Dragon Blade had a well thought out story to it, unlike the run of the mill production-line senseless stories that have been coming out of Hong Kong over the last ten/fifteen years. In Wushu, the director again gives us something unexpected, and again a well thought out story. As a family film it has something for everyone and I enjoyed myself throughout it. The story of the kids growing up in a poor single parent family is both touching and current, and I thought the way wushu as a sport was presented was very smart. Sammo Hung's performance as the father and teacher was surprisingly good... he should have got an award for it! Though the fight scenes in it don't number enough to satisfy the die hard action over all else fans, the main fight scene where Sammo comes up against the main bad guy is fantastic edge of the seat stuff. All in all, I laughed at the fun parts, was touched by the father-son relationship, was excited by the action, and amazed by the skills. This film was all out good entertainment... and in the end isn't that what we all pay to watch a film for?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":723,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"2008-10-23","keywords":"wushu,kidnapping,school,martial arts,violence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jackie Chan Presents: Wushu","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4013360153","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA3MjgwNTcyMzJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NTE3MzMx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA3MjgwNTcyMzJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NTE3MzMx._V1_.jpg","description":"Jackie Chan Presents: Wushu"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005033/","name":"Sammo Kam-Bo Hung"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2908302/","name":"Fengchao Liu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2508913/","name":"Wenjie Wang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0844038/","name":"Antony Szeto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133530/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150586/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0150862/","name":"Dennis Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1210118/","name":"Ho-Leung Lau"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Battle of the Bulge
Bitka u Ardenima
programme.desc:
Battle of the Bulge: Directed by Ken Annakin. With Henry Fonda, Robert Shaw, Robert Ryan, Dana Andrews. A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058947/","name":"Battle of the Bulge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDEzMWI4ZWMtNGFiMy00M2QzLTlhZWUtY2QwZTcyYzMwODAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A dramatization of Nazi Germany's final Western Front counterattack of World War II.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058947/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"glentom1"},"dateCreated":"2007-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch the movie, you will like it!","reviewBody":"I love this movie. Great actors, great scenes. The song the panzer commanders sing is a great moment in movie history.

I read other reviews and many of them I don't understand. Some of them give one star because they say the movie is so historically inaccurate. Was the TV show Combat accurate? Was the popular movie Dirty Dozen accurate? If you want accuracy, stick to the History channel, and even then there will be debates. If you want an entertaining war flick, watch this one! There are none much better.

Another gripe I have with reviews on this movie is with those that question its title. There actually was a Battle of the Bulge in military history. But there never was a "Longest Day" battle. Titles of movies are meant to bring people to the theater, not teach history.

Lest you think I am not an educated reviewer, you should know I was an enlisted Marine, then an Officer of Marines 30 years ago. My family goes back to the Revolutionary War, the Civil War, WW1, WW2, the Korean War, Vietnam, and afterwards.

Even if I was a fly on the wall watching one of my ancestors participate in the Battle of the Bulge, that would not qualify me to comment on the entire battle. Watch the movie, you will like it for entertainment. Then read a book afterwards if you worry you have not been sufficiently educated.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15847,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","History","War"],"datePublished":"1966-01-19","keywords":"wehrmacht,20th century,1940s,battle of the bulge,world war two in belgium","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi226474521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNlYzQwNDMtZjBkMS00ODUwLTkwZTktZGI0NjY2ODM5NDRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTNlYzQwNDMtZjBkMS00ODUwLTkwZTktZGI0NjY2ODM5NDRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000020/","name":"Henry Fonda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001727/","name":"Robert Shaw"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0752813/","name":"Robert Ryan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002175/","name":"Ken Annakin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079079/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0110887/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0948634/","name":"Philip Yordan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0818328/","name":"Milton Sperling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578367/","name":"John Melson"}],"duration":"PT2H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sydney White
Super luzeri
programme.desc:
Sydney White: Directed by Joe Nussbaum. With Amanda Bynes, Sara Paxton, Matt Long, Jack Carpenter. A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0815244/","name":"Sydney White","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk3ODc3ODAxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzcwMDU1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A modern retelling of Snow White set against students in their freshman year of college in the greek system.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0815244/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jaddison383"},"dateCreated":"2007-09-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Modern Day Fairy Tale...","reviewBody":"Don't we all wish our lives could be fairy tales??? In this movie, that's exactly what one naive and tomboyish girl named Sydney White gets. To us, it seems like a rather familiar story.

What Amanda Bynes is so good at is delivering clean and funny teen and family comedies. She is a very funny actress, and continues to be respectable by not screwing up her life like most actresses her age. She's cute as Sydney, though her tan was not. It was quite over-done in fact. Besides her the ones who steal the show are, of course, the dorks (aka dwarfs). They are certainly adorable, and we can't help but think that Sydney has found the best possible friends on campus. The downfall in the cast was Sara Paxton as the arch-nemesis Rachel WITCHburn. She just didn't seem quite evil enough for me. Crystal Hunt was also not that great as Sydney southern friend Dinky.

There are some laugh-out-loud moments and one-liners. The most fun part of the movie is catching the fairy tale parts as they come. That and watching the dorks. "Sydney White" is a fine family film and will even work well for teens, and it has a very nice message. However, it never reaches any kind of high point and kind of just seems to go on at a continuous rate. Still, it's worth a watch as a diversion from reality and back into fairy tale world. 6/10 stars! 

Jay Addison","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":47640,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-04-16","keywords":"college,sorority,college girl,female protagonist,sorority house","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sydney White","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3752919321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MzQ0NTI1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA1NjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MzQ0NTI1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTA1NjYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sydney White - Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004789/","name":"Amanda Bynes"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0668139/","name":"Sara Paxton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1668265/","name":"Matt Long"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0638271/","name":"Joe Nussbaum"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033472/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0201512/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097249/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1548657/","name":"Chad Gomez Creasey"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Death Defying Acts
Prkoseći smrti
programme.desc: Death Defying Acts: Directed by Gillian Armstrong. With Guy Pearce, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Timothy Spall, Saoirse Ronan. On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini (Guy Pearce) enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0472071/","name":"Death Defying Acts","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI0MDA4MzM4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjE3Nzc3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On a tour of Britain in 1926, Harry Houdini (Guy Pearce) enters into a passionate affair with a psychic out to con him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0472071/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maximkong"},"dateCreated":"2012-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Probably better than the Prestige","reviewBody":"i do not know why this film is flushed with negative reviews. First of all this is not a film about Houdini, there is no reason why this film should dramatically display the amazing acts and potentials of the artist himself; Secondly, i do not see why 'there is no reason for the creation of this movie' is justifiable, this film is just a testimony on how characters carry on with their lives and that itself is enough to make a film meaningful...in fact films like 'Atonement' (where the girl is also in) deserves this statement better where everything is just so FAKE. Third, i haven't watch the illusionist but i have to say this is richer in detail, and thus better than the Prestige--a film which displays too much magic 'action' but no depth to the characters or the plot at all, like an eggshell without the yoke inside...Lastly, this is a decent film where everything is well-made, well presented, well acting performances (exception of Catherine's dramatically 'fake' acting at times), and a good score","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10034,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","History","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-03-13","keywords":"psychotronic film,f rated,death in title,muscular physique,man in a straight jacket","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Death Defying Acts: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi787153177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwNzg5NDYzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzOTc3MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwNzg5NDYzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzOTc3MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for Death Defying Acts, directed by Gillian Armstrong."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001876/","name":"Catherine Zeta-Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001602/","name":"Guy Pearce"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001758/","name":"Timothy Spall"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000788/","name":"Gillian Armstrong"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023514/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033226/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342617/","name":"Tony Grisoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911422/","name":"Brian Ward"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer
Parfem: Povijest jednog ubojice
programme.desc:
Perfume: The Story of a Murderer: Directed by Tom Tykwer. With Ben Whishaw, Francesc Albiol, Gonzalo Cunill, Rachel Hurd-Wood. Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0396171/","name":"Perfume: The Story of a Murderer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2Mzk2NjkzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzIzOTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0396171/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"matheistin"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unusual. That's why it's great.","reviewBody":"wow, a serial-killer movie WITHOUT blood and action and wild chase sequences and stuff like this.

People who are used to fast Hollywood Movies certainly won't be satisfied with this movie. It's really unusual, as the novel is. It's generally difficult to convey something like a SMELL in a book or a movie, and it's also difficult to create a satisfying adaption of a novel. So my personal opinion is that The Parfume Movie is one of the few good adaptations, because it eagerly tries to convey the complicated world of smells and the world of Grenouille and also achieves it in many ways. There are of course some parts missing or changed if you compare novel and movie, but that is always the case with adaptations.

I saw the movie one hour ago and have just read some comments. Some of them are "disappointed" or "boooring", but most of these opinions are really not well founded, so I couldn't make out what EXACTLY was so boring and disappointing... His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0396171/","name":"Perfume: The Story of a Murderer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2Mzk2NjkzNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzIzOTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0396171/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"matheistin","dateCreated":"2006-09-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unusual. That's why it's great.","reviewBody":"wow, a serial-killer movie WITHOUT blood and action and wild chase sequences and stuff like this.

People who are used to fast Hollywood Movies certainly won't be satisfied with this movie. It's really unusual, as the novel is. It's generally difficult to convey something like a SMELL in a book or a movie, and it's also difficult to create a satisfying adaption of a novel. So my personal opinion is that The Parfume Movie is one of the few good adaptations, because it eagerly tries to convey the complicated world of smells and the world of Grenouille and also achieves it in many ways. There are of course some parts missing or changed if you compare novel and movie, but that is always the case with adaptations.

I saw the movie one hour ago and have just read some comments. Some of them are "disappointed" or "boooring", but most of these opinions are really not well founded, so I couldn't make out what EXACTLY was so boring and disappointing... However, I'll keep on dwelling in the magic of the movie, looking forward to other more positive comments...","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":242174,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2007-04-11","keywords":"18th century,smell,scent,perfume,sense of smell","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Perfume: The Story of a Murderer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4003135769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQxYzE3ZTAtMTg0MC00MzlhLTgwZTEtNzBmNjkyZjBmZTU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQxYzE3ZTAtMTg0MC00MzlhLTgwZTEtNzBmNjkyZjBmZTU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0924210/","name":"Ben Whishaw","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000163/","name":"Dustin Hoffman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000614/","name":"Alan Rickman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0319096/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001949/","name":"Andrew Birkin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0251536/","name":"Bernd Eichinger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"],"duration":"PT2H27M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ghost Ship
Ukleti brod
programme.desc: Ghost Ship: Directed by Steve Beck. With Gabriel Byrne, Julianna Margulies, Ron Eldard, Desmond Harrington. A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0288477/","name":"Ghost Ship","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NTA4NDIwMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTc4NDE3._V1_.jpg","description":"A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0288477/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Coventry"},"dateCreated":"2004-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love Boat' out of hell!!","reviewBody":"I'm rather pleasantly surprised after seeing Ghost Ship I expected it to be a lot sillier, more dumb and inferior than it actually is. Still a long way from being a good horror film but a step in the right direction, to say the least. Cast and crew paid attention to building up a horrifying atmosphere instead of attacking the audience with lame and violent killing scenes. That's an effort that gets my appreciation. The vicious opening sequence is professional horror a scene that grabs you by the throat and demands your complete attention and curiosity for the rest of the movie. The high quality level is held up a little while longer but unfortunately it loses his grip during the second half. For as long as the mysterious, deserted ship is portrayed as a complete riddle, the film is fascinating, interesting and beautifully shot. As soon as a few plot-aspects are clarified, Ghost Ship turns into a mediocre and predictable thriller I'm convinced that, with a slightly more intelligent script, this could have become one of the better horror-thrillers since the new Millennium. Now, it's only regarded as a reasonable and decent effort that lacks a bit of talent. Nonetheless, the settings and decors make it worth watching. The graphic decorations aren't overused, so it remains a beautiful experience to observe at least once. Gabriel Byrne is acting far below his normal standards and yet he's still great! All the other cast-members are pretty uninspired and forgettable. I'd describe Ghost Ship as a nice waste of time. If you have the opportunity, I advise you to search for an 80's horror title called `Death Ship' a terrific piece of trash of which Ghost Ship borrowed a lot of ideas.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":98070,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2003-03-26","keywords":"ghost ship,characters murdered one by one,evil spirit,death trap,reference to the bering straits","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghost Ship","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2794390041","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmIzZTY4ZjgtMjMzZi00MjZlLTk4MWUtOTNhYWViZTJlNjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmIzZTY4ZjgtMjMzZi00MjZlLTk4MWUtOTNhYWViZTJlNjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Blu-Ray trailer for this mystery about an abandoned ship"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000523/","name":"Julianna Margulies"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000321/","name":"Gabriel Byrne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0253035/","name":"Ron Eldard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0065284/","name":"Steve Beck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0227121/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024939/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0360144/","name":"Mark Hanlon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688282/","name":"John Pogue"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
Sveci protiv mafije
programme.desc: The Boondock Saints: Directed by Troy Duffy. With Willem Dafoe, Sean Patrick Flanery, Norman Reedus, David Della Rocco. Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0144117/","name":"The Boondock Saints","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzVmMTdjOTYtOTJkYS00ZTg2LWExNTgtNzA1N2Y0MDgwYWFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0144117/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TBJCSKCNRRQTreviews"},"dateCreated":"2004-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great unusual action film","reviewBody":"Very intelligent action movie, about two Irish brothers who kill 'sinners' to punish them. The movie is a bit different from the typical action movie, as it doesn't have car-chases or explosions. The action consists of stylish shooting sprees. It also has a fairly original idea that is utilized in nearly every action scene in the movie, and that should be used more often in action films; first you see the aftermath, the crime-scene, the police investigating, counting bodies, etc. After/as the police come up with theories to the crime, we see the actual scene, of the brothers punishing criminals. It's a different kind of vigilante movie. It's particularly gory and bloody, but this just makes it all the more realistic. In real life, there is a significant amount of blood when someone is shot in the head. The movie has some Christian subtexts, I think I've heard about five major theories about the whole movie's meaning. This shows, in my opinion, that there was obviously a lot of thought put into the movie. I'd recommend it to anyone who can stand the gore, even if they aren't Christians. 10/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":233735,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2000-01-21","keywords":"cauterizing a wound,drinking,groping,cult film,independent film","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Boondock Saints","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi915800345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg5MTA2ZjItNzcwOS00NjAyLWIwODMtOTdkMzNhNTczZGRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg5MTA2ZjItNzcwOS00NjAyLWIwODMtOTdkMzNhNTczZGRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Indican"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000353/","name":"Willem Dafoe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001218/","name":"Sean Patrick Flanery"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005342/","name":"Norman Reedus"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240627/","name":"Troy Duffy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043393/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054733/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0053780/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240627/","name":"Troy Duffy"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
Deveta vrata
programme.desc:
The Ninth Gate: Directed by Roman Polanski. With Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin, Emmanuelle Seigner. A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0142688/","name":"The Ninth Gate","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Q1ZTFhMmYtNDljMS00Y2ZhLWE3M2QtMjYwYmFkYmJmMjI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0NTI0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0142688/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Tardis_phone_home"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The movie is a riddle too","reviewBody":"Roman Polanski's movies aren't about shooting and destruction like so many other movies these days, his movies are about people and their remarkable adventures. The Ninth Gate is supposed to be a thriller or horror movie but it is neither. The Ninth Gate is an occult movie and that is a whole different ballpark.

spoilers ahead!

'You have before you the mystery of which men have dreamed throughout the centuries. Thousands have died an agonizing death in hopes of just a glimpse of what you're about to see!' Those words are spoken by Boris Balkan, moments before he sets himself on fire in an attempt to raise the devil. The Ninth Gate is not only a movie about occultism, it is an occult movie by itself. First there is of course the obvious story that most people find quite disappointing BUT under the surface there is the real story that is only understood by those who are fairly familiar with symbolism and occultism. 

Although The Ninth gate is based on just a part of the book El Club Dumas, it is nevertheless a clever story of its own. 

The movie is about a riddle that is supposed to be hidden in three books, in the end that riddle is solved by Dean Corso. The movie itself contains a riddle and that riddle is to be solved by us. Besides the engravings, lots of symbolism and hints will help us understand the meaning of several strange events and eventually the meaning of what the story is all about and what happened to Balkan and Corso. The plot is created around a joke, a joke that is based on a misunderstanding. This makes a movie that one needs to see more than once, I bought the DVD and saw it over twenty times. The story gets better every time you watch it, pay attention to even the smallest details like the color of the mysterious girl's socks, there is a good reason why Corso has a shoulder bag and an overcoat he never seems to part from, until the 'notorious' very last scene; shoulder bag and overcoat are gone... Aren't you curious about the meaning of broken glasses in combination of a mark between the eyes? Search the internet for the answers to the questions you have. It's fun if you like to solve riddles, I had a great time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":174931,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-08-25","keywords":"rare book,book detective,bibliophilia,satanic,unholy book","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Ninth Gate","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2649817369","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjU3MDEwNzgtMjU1NC00OTY0LTg2NzMtMzY5ZTNjMWRjNjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjU3MDEwNzgtMjU1NC00OTY0LTg2NzMtMzY5ZTNjMWRjNjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Artisan"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001449/","name":"Frank Langella"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000565/","name":"Lena Olin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000591/","name":"Roman Polanski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014903/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024473/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027161/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0702416/","name":"Arturo Pérez-Reverte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115224/","name":"John Brownjohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881762/","name":"Enrique Urbizu"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0142688, Title: The Ninth Gate, --- Description: The Ninth Gate: Directed by Roman Polanski. With Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin, Emmanuelle Seigner. A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0142688/","name":"The Ninth Gate","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Q1ZTFhMmYtNDljMS00Y2ZhLWE3M2QtMjYwYmFkYmJmMjI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0NTI0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0142688/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Tardis_phone_home","dateCreated":"2005-08-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The movie is a riddle too","reviewBody":"Roman Polanski's movies aren't about shooting and destruction like so many other movies these days, his movies are about people and their remarkable adventures. The Ninth Gate is supposed to be a thriller or horror movie but it is neither. The Ninth Gate is an occult movie and that is a whole different ballpark.

spoilers ahead!

'You have before you the mystery of which men have dreamed throughout the centuries. Thousands have died an agonizing death in hopes of just a glimpse of what you're about to see!' Those words are spoken by Boris Balkan, moments before he sets himself on fire in an attempt to raise the devil. The Ninth Gate is not only a movie about occultism, it is an occult movie by itself. First there is of course the obvious story that most people find quite disappointing BUT under the surface there is the real story that is only understood by those who are fairly familiar with symbolism and occultism. 

Although The Ninth gate is based on just a part of the book El Club Dumas, it is nevertheless a clever story of its own. 

The movie is about a riddle that is supposed to be hidden in three books, in the end that riddle is solved by Dean Corso. The movie itself contains a riddle and that riddle is to be solved by us. Besides the engravings, lots of symbolism and hints will help us understand the meaning of several strange events and eventually the meaning of what the story is all about and what happened to Balkan and Corso. The plot is created around a joke, a joke that is based on a misunderstanding. This makes a movie that one needs to see more than once, I bought the DVD and saw it over twenty times. The story gets better every time you watch it, pay attention to even the smallest details like the color of the mysterious girl's socks, there is a good reason why Corso has a shoulder bag and an overcoat he never seems to part from, until the 'notorious' very last scene; shoulder bag and overcoat are gone... Aren't you curious about the meaning of broken glasses in combination of a mark between the eyes? Search the internet for the answers to the questions you have. It's fun if you like to solve riddles, I had a great time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":174931,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1999-08-25","keywords":"rare book,book detective,bibliophilia,satanic,unholy book","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Ninth Gate","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2649817369","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjU3MDEwNzgtMjU1NC00OTY0LTg2NzMtMzY5ZTNjMWRjNjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjU3MDEwNzgtMjU1NC00OTY0LTg2NzMtMzY5ZTNjMWRjNjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Artisan","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000136/","name":"Johnny Depp","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001449/","name":"Frank Langella","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000565/","name":"Lena Olin"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000591/","name":"Roman Polanski"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014903/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024473/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027161/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0702416/","name":"Arturo Pérez-Reverte","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115224/","name":"John Brownjohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881762/","name":"Enrique Urbizu"],"duration":"PT2H13M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mr. Bones
Mr. Bones
programme.desc: Mr. Bones: Directed by Gray Hofmeyr. With Leon Schuster, David Ramsey, Faizon Love, Robert Whitehead. A medicine man is sent looking for the son of his tribal king, and brings back an American golfer and a host of goons intent on keeping him in the golf tournament." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0302819/","name":"Mr. Bones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQ5ZjFiNDMtMjNiNy00YjNjLTk5OWUtMjE1ZjAyZGRkOWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkxMTU1Njc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A medicine man is sent looking for the son of his tribal king, and brings back an American golfer and a host of goons intent on keeping him in the golf tournament.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0302819/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eveningthought"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent","reviewBody":"It's refreshing to see an Afrikaans film being better and funnier than it's American counter-parts. All Afrikaaners will be familiar with comedian Leon Schuster's work (particularly "You must be Joking") and he plays his character with his usual gusto and madness. The film is hilarious, proving that a juvenile sense of humor doesn't have to be bad thing (especially during the toilet scene). It's a fantastic movie with a great cast, inevitably overwhelmed by Schuster .\n\nObviously not everyone will be able to get the South African humor, or indeed, some of the stronger accents, and some could accuse the movie of going for cheap laughs and being unoriginal. But with a that said it still manages to blow most comedies out of the water. And besides, what's wrong with recycling some jokes if you do them better than they ever were in the first play. Hopefully this will help gain the South African film industry some momentum, but if it doesn't, well then we still get a cool movie out of it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2619,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2002-12-18","keywords":"slapstick comedy,character name as title,mr. bones character,two word title,south african","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0776856/","name":"Leon Schuster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0708981/","name":"David Ramsey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522324/","name":"Faizon Love"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0389415/","name":"Gray Hofmeyr"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037852/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133353/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0389415/","name":"Gray Hofmeyr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0490417/","name":"Greg Latter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0776856/","name":"Leon Schuster"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Moon
Udar
programme.desc:
Moon: Directed by Duncan Jones. With Sam Rockwell, Kevin Spacey, Dominique McElligott, Rosie Shaw. Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1182345/","name":"Moon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzODgyNTQwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc0NTc0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1182345/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Craig_McPherson"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Small in scope, Grandiose in concept","reviewBody":"While book racks are brimming with thought provoking, high concept science fiction, the movie genre tends to be populated by invading aliens, intergalactic wars, and adventure, which makes Director and co-writer Duncan Jones' Moon that much more of an oddity.

Not since Steven Soderbergh's much overlooked 2002 rendition of Stanislaw Lem's Solaris has a movie firmly rooted in the sci-fi realm delivered reflections on the human condition, which Moon does deftly.

It tells the story of Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell), the only inhabitant of an automated lunar mining base extracting Helium-3 from lunar rocks to be shipped back to Earth to fuel the energy starved planet.

Sam's isolated three year posting is about to come to an end and he longs to return to Earth to see his wife. His only company throughout this sojourn has been that of Gerty, the base's HAL-like robot voiced by Kevin Spacey. Unfortunately, the final weeks and days are proving to be the most difficult, and Sam finds himself going a bit squirrelly, leaving both he and the audience to wonder if what's unfolding is actually happening, or merely a drama taking place in his addled mind.

That's about as much plot detail as I'm going to deliver, for to delve any deeper into the story would give too much away. Be prepared, however, for a thought provoking narrative that touches on issues such as scientific ethics, corporate greed, human identity, and compassion.

There are no aliens, lasers/phasers, wormholes, warp engines or jump drives here, just a lonely space age concierge, an unflappable monotone robot, and a whole lot of fodder for your brain to chow down on.

This is what science fiction was meant to be.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":347192,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-07-10","keywords":"moon,solitude,memory,cult film,human clone","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Moon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1265108249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDhhNzE4NjEtMGIyZC00MDBiLTk0ZGMtY2ZhNjFkMWEwN2VkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDhhNzE4NjEtMGIyZC00MDBiLTk0ZGMtY2ZhNjFkMWEwN2VkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this sci-fi movie"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005377/","name":"Sam Rockwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000228/","name":"Kevin Spacey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1069800/","name":"Dominique McElligott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1512910/","name":"Duncan Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014453/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232575/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1512910/","name":"Duncan Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2914162/","name":"Nathan Parker"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

Unfortunately, the final weeks and days are proving to be the most difficult, and Sam finds himself going a bit squirrelly, leaving both he and the audience to wonder if what's unfolding is actually happening, or merely a drama taking place in his addled mind.

That's about as much plot detail as I'm going to deliver, for to delve any deeper into the story would give too much away. Be prepared, however, for a thought provoking narrative that touches on issues such as scientific ethics, corporate greed, human identity, and compassion.

There are no aliens, lasers/phasers, wormholes, warp engines or jump drives here, just a lonely space age concierge, an unflappable monotone robot, and a whole lot of fodder for your brain to chow down on.

This is what science fiction was meant to be.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":347192,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-07-10","keywords":"moon,solitude,memory,cult film,human clone","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Moon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1265108249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDhhNzE4NjEtMGIyZC00MDBiLTk0ZGMtY2ZhNjFkMWEwN2VkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDhhNzE4NjEtMGIyZC00MDBiLTk0ZGMtY2ZhNjFkMWEwN2VkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this sci-fi movie"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005377/","name":"Sam Rockwell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000228/","name":"Kevin Spacey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1069800/","name":"Dominique McElligott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1512910/","name":"Duncan Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014453/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232575/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1512910/","name":"Duncan Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2914162/","name":"Nathan Parker"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Sam Rockwell (role=Sam Bell), Kevin Spacey (role=GERTY), Dominique McElligott (role=Tess Bell), Rosie Shaw (role=Little Eve), Adrienne Shaw (role=Nanny), Kaya Scodelario (role=Eve), Benedict Wong (role=Thompson), Matt Berry (role=Overmeyers), Malcolm Stewart (role=Technician), Robin Chalk (role=Sam Bell Clone), Gavin Rothery (role=Eliza Rescue Captain), Gary Shaw (role=Shaw, Rescue Team Member)

IMDb data; ttnr: 1182345, Title: Moon, --- Description: Moon: Directed by Duncan Jones. With Sam Rockwell, Kevin Spacey, Dominique McElligott, Rosie Shaw. Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1182345/","name":"Moon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgzODgyNTQwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc0NTc0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1182345/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Craig_McPherson","dateCreated":"2009-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Small in scope, Grandiose in concept","reviewBody":"While book racks are brimming with thought provoking, high concept science fiction, the movie genre tends to be populated by invading aliens, intergalactic wars, and adventure, which makes Director and co-writer Duncan Jones' Moon that much more of an oddity.

Not since Steven Soderbergh's much overlooked 2002 rendition of Stanislaw Lem's Solaris has a movie firmly rooted in the sci-fi realm delivered reflections on the human condition, which Moon does deftly.

It tells the story of Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell), the only inhabitant of an automated lunar mining base extracting Helium-3 from lunar rocks to be shipped back to Earth to fuel the energy starved planet.

Sam's isolated three year posting is about to come to an end and he longs to return to Earth to see his wife. His only company throughout this sojourn has been that of Gerty, the base's HAL-like robot voiced by Kevin Spacey. Unfortunately, the final weeks and days are proving to be the most difficult, and Sam finds himself going a bit squirrelly, leaving both he and the audience to wonder if what's unfolding is actually happening, or merely a drama taking place in his addled mind.

That's about as much plot detail as I'm going to deliver, for to delve any deeper into the story would give too much away. Be prepared, however, for a thought provoking narrative that touches on issues such as scientific ethics, corporate greed, human identity, and compassion.

There are no aliens, lasers/phasers, wormholes, warp engines or jump drives here, just a lonely space age concierge, an unflappable monotone robot, and a whole lot of fodder for your brain to chow down on.

This is what science fiction was meant to be.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":347192,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2009-07-10","keywords":"moon,solitude,memory,cult film,human clone","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Moon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1265108249","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDhhNzE4NjEtMGIyZC00MDBiLTk0ZGMtY2ZhNjFkMWEwN2VkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDhhNzE4NjEtMGIyZC00MDBiLTk0ZGMtY2ZhNjFkMWEwN2VkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this sci-fi movie","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005377/","name":"Sam Rockwell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000228/","name":"Kevin Spacey","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1069800/","name":"Dominique McElligott"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1512910/","name":"Duncan Jones"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014453/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0222021/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232575/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1512910/","name":"Duncan Jones","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2914162/","name":"Nathan Parker"],"duration":"PT1H37M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wushu
Wushu
programme.desc: Wushu: Directed by Antony Szeto. With Sammo Kam-Bo Hung, Fengchao Liu, Wenjie Wang, Phoebe Wang. Ten years ago, five students joined a martial arts school and learned the disciplines of Wushu and the bonds of friendship. Today, both will be put to the test after they and a former student stumble into a child kidnapping ring." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0790786/","name":"Wushu","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5MjAzMjUwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTM0Mjg0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Ten years ago, five students joined a martial arts school and learned the disciplines of Wushu and the bonds of friendship. Today, both will be put to the test after they and a former student stumble into a child kidnapping ring.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0790786/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rob14666"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is Entertainment!","reviewBody":"There's been a lot of hype about this film, and as a fan of kung fu films I've been looking forward to seeing it. The other thing that made me interested is the director, Antony Szeto, cause I saw his first film Dragon Blade in the theaters. Dragon Blade was a kid's computer animated film but the martial arts action in it is far more superior to the jumping around camera shots used for the fights in Kung Fu Panda. And Dragon Blade had a well thought out story to it, unlike the run of the mill production-line senseless stories that have been coming out of Hong Kong over the last ten/fifteen years. In Wushu, the director again gives us something unexpected, and again a well thought out story. As a family film it has something for everyone and I enjoyed myself throughout it. The story of the kids growing up in a poor single parent family is both touching and current, and I thought the way wushu as a sport was presented was very smart. Sammo Hung's performance as the father and teacher was surprisingly good... he should have got an award for it! Though the fight scenes in it don't number enough to satisfy the die hard action over all else fans, the main fight scene where Sammo comes up against the main bad guy is fantastic edge of the seat stuff. All in all, I laughed at the fun parts, was touched by the father-son relationship, was excited by the action, and amazed by the skills. This film was all out good entertainment... and in the end isn't that what we all pay to watch a film for?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":723,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"2008-10-23","keywords":"wushu,kidnapping,school,martial arts,violence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jackie Chan Presents: Wushu","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4013360153","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA3MjgwNTcyMzJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NTE3MzMx._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA3MjgwNTcyMzJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDA5NTE3MzMx._V1_.jpg","description":"Jackie Chan Presents: Wushu"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005033/","name":"Sammo Kam-Bo Hung"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2908302/","name":"Fengchao Liu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2508913/","name":"Wenjie Wang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0844038/","name":"Antony Szeto"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133530/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150586/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0150862/","name":"Dennis Chan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1210118/","name":"Ho-Leung Lau"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: See No Evil, Hear No Evil: Directed by Arthur Hiller. With Richard Pryor, Gene Wilder, Joan Severance, Kevin Spacey. Dave is deaf, and Wally is blind. They witness a murder, but it was Dave who was looking at her, and Wally who was listening." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0098282/","name":"See No Evil, Hear No Evil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ1YWFmNDEtMDMyMi00OWU5LWIwMDktYjE1YjcwZjBlNDBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2MjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dave is deaf, and Wally is blind. They witness a murder, but it was Dave who was looking at her, and Wally who was listening.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0098282/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Smoothpants"},"dateCreated":"2003-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Underrated comedy","reviewBody":"This pairing of Gene Wilder and Richard Pryor, while not "Silver Streak" and not the first half of "Stir Crazy", is still an amusing comedy with some absolutely hilarious moments. I mean, let's face it...the second half of Stir Crazy is as boring as it gets. This film lags in spots, but the chemistry of Pryor and Wilder does satisfy. Stay away from "Another You" (as I did). I figured that this film was as good as we were going to get from Pryor and Wilder. Was I right? I dunno. I stayed away from "Another You"."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52729,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1989-05-12","keywords":"deaf,blind man,penis joke,murder,witness","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"See No Evil, Hear No Evil","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1165009177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg4YmI3NDktNWUyZS00NDFjLTgxMzQtZDUxNDIyZGZiYjRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg4YmI3NDktNWUyZS00NDFjLTgxMzQtZDUxNDIyZGZiYjRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for See No Evil, Hear No Evil"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001640/","name":"Richard Pryor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000698/","name":"Gene Wilder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000220/","name":"Joan Severance"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002137/","name":"Arthur Hiller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0056958/","name":"Earl Barret"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0838441/","name":"Arne Sultan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941703/","name":"Marvin Worth"}],"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Waterworld
Vodeni svijet
programme.desc: Waterworld: Directed by Kevin Reynolds. With Kevin Costner, Chaim Jeraffi, Rick Aviles, R.D. Call. In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114898/","name":"Waterworld","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzE4NTRmMDYtNWYzYi00YmNkLTk4NDEtYjFmMDc4ODQ3ODY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114898/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"helpless_dancer"},"dateCreated":"1999-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"lots of action, little reality","reviewBody":"This is an unpopular movie, and I don't see why it is so. Admittedly, it is unbelievable, but so are James Bond films. There was enough action in this one to keep thriller buffs going all the way through. Costner did a good job portraying a lonely vagabond in a crazy, violent world. Dennis Hopper, as usual, was an effective villain; he kept me laughing all the way with his insane antics, and his stupid henchmen. I have to wonder, however, if the full nude shot of the girl was really the actress I had been watching. With clothes on, she didn't look all that well endowed. IMDb data; ttnr: 0114898, Title: Waterworld, --- Description: Waterworld: Directed by Kevin Reynolds. With Kevin Costner, Chaim Jeraffi, Rick Aviles, R.D. Call. In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114898/","name":"Waterworld","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzE4NTRmMDYtNWYzYi00YmNkLTk4NDEtYjFmMDc4ODQ3ODY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTUyMzE4Mzg@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114898/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"helpless_dancer","dateCreated":"1999-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"lots of action, little reality","reviewBody":"This is an unpopular movie, and I don't see why it is so. Admittedly, it is unbelievable, but so are James Bond films. There was enough action in this one to keep thriller buffs going all the way through. Costner did a good job portraying a lonely vagabond in a crazy, violent world. Dennis Hopper, as usual, was an effective villain; he kept me laughing all the way with his insane antics, and his stupid henchmen. I have to wonder, however, if the full nude shot of the girl was really the actress I had been watching. With clothes on, she didn't look all that well endowed. programme.title: DOA: Dead or Alive
DOA: Živ ili Mrtav
programme.desc:
DOA: Dead or Alive: Directed by Corey Yuen. With Jaime Pressly, Devon Aoki, Holly Valance, Sarah Carter. The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, an invitational martial arts contest. There, four female rival fighters will have to work together to uncover the secret that the organizer of the tournament is trying to hide." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0398913/","name":"DOA: Dead or Alive","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIyNDQ0NDExMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAxMTk0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The world's best fighters are invited to DOA, an invitational martial arts contest. There, four female rival fighters will have to work together to uncover the secret that the organizer of the tournament is trying to hide.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0398913/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Quaay"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Poor Excuse For A Plot, But Good Action, Really Not That Bad","reviewBody":"Wow. I never thought In my wildest dreams that I would be standing behind this film, sticking up for it opposed to slandering it with the rest. I actually went to see it for a laugh and so what if there were a half dozen beautiful girls flaunting there stuff right? well the first 10 minutes kinda made me think I was gonna be dead right, but not entirely. Sure it was a very poor excuse for a plot, but the action was really quite good. Before I get into that I need to make a remark, a lot of people have been slandering this movie because of it's story line, fair enough, but if you say that it doesn't make sense, you must be one thick chimpanzee, The story is so linear it hurts, and very, I repeat VERY easy to understand! Back to the movie. The acting was fine, I was especially pleased at Holly's Performance, A perfect role for her I would say, if Anyone's ever seen any of her film clips

Plot: Pro-wrestler Tina (Jaime Pressly), master thief Christie (Holly Valance), and ninja princess Kasumi (Devon Aoki) are competitors in a martial arts tournament with a $10 million prize.

That pretty much sums up the basis of the plot haha but yeah. Good Action, Hot Girls, a worth while watch. Oh and another thing, Sarah Carter who starred in 3 episodes of Smallville plays another butt kickin' Babe, very sexy. It was kind of refreshing be able to watch a movie where the plot wasn't really a problem at all, all you had to do was focus on what was going on, no having to think about how this person knows this person and why they want to kill each other. It was also good to see a 'Girl Power' Flick which wasn't cheesy in the way that Charlie's Angels was, yeah it was cheesy in other ways, but none of that, "come on angels, let's go get 'em" All in all a good watch, I just hope they don't try and do a sequel *sighs* and IF they do, I hope they get a damn script writer!!!!

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell
Odvuci me u pakao
programme.desc:
Drag Me to Hell: Directed by Sam Raimi. With Alison Lohman, Justin Long, Lorna Raver, Dileep Rao. A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1127180/","name":"Drag Me to Hell","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQwNTMyNjc5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTI2MTQ0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1127180/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AvinashPatalay"},"dateCreated":"2011-05-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A stitch in time saves nine","reviewBody":""Drag Me To Hell" transports to you to the era of 1980's where blood, gore, chills and likes of "Nightmare on Elm Street" / "Evil Dead" spawned in plenty. And yes, for a welcome change "Drag Me To Hell" steers clear from the Japanese horror genre and pans out to be a very much American product. 

 Alison Lohman "i can shriek" delivers the right expressions warranted for a horror movie. Anything more would have been potential overdose. 

 Justin Long "Keanu Reeves impersonator" is plastic expressions all the way. 

 Reggie Lee "corporate pacman" does a good job of munching up everything that comes between him and the success ladder.

 David Paymer "carrot dangler" knows how to make the rabbits dance to his tunes. 

 Lorna Raver "the trigger of Lamia curse" ensures to get etched in the memory and haunt you for a very long time. 

 Dileep Rao "amateur spiritualist" was okay'ish. It appears his part got hijacked by his Guru.

 Flor de Maria Chahua "avenger in waiting" has a brief but effective role. And so was her assistant. 

All in all "Drag Me To Hell" is both tacky and cheesy, but that doesn't stop it from sending shivers down the spine. The screenplay is void of drag moments ensuring the audience get fright doses at regular intervals. Good utilisation of visual effects and the background score alleviate the visual experience. The potholes in writing could have been easily creased out. Not exactly horror-comedy like "Shawn Of The Dead" but it does have well-interlaced comical moments between the chills. 

Watchable fare... and yes a few days you potentially might abstain from using the staplers."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":195813,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2009-10-07","keywords":"metaphor,psychic,evil,fight,psychologist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Drag Me to Hell: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3899917081","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3NjE3NzE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTcwNDEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3NjE3NzE3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTcwNDEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A loan officer (Lohman) ordered to evict an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse which turns her life into a living nightmare."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0517844/","name":"Alison Lohman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0519043/","name":"Justin Long"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0515207/","name":"Ruth Livier"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176807/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706898/","name":"Ivan Raimi"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Shield
programme.desc: Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom... Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom, specijalnom policijom koja se koristi nezakonitim metodama u borbi protiv kriminala, ali vrlo učinkovitim.

programme.title: Dobri liječnik
programme.desc: The Good Doctor serija je o mladom autističnom kirurgu koji se seli u San Jose kako bi počeo raditi u bolnici. Pratite zbivanja ovog mladog genijalca i njegovu svakodnevnicu! Američka serija The Good Doctor prikazuje život mladog kirurga Shauna Murphyja, autističnoga stručnjaka i genijalca koji ima malo drukčiji pogled od društva na sve oko njega. Seli se iz mjestašca u kojem je preživio teško djetinjstvo u San Jose kako bi radio u bolnici. Kako se snalazi na radnom mjestu i s kojim se sve situacijama susreće, pogledajte u ovoj uzbudljivoj seriji!

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"timmurphy-2"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid Show","reviewBody":"Look...no network TV show is going to be totally accurate. This isn't a documentary. I was a JAG and that TV show wasn't even close to being accurate. But it WAS entertaining. And, like this show, it captures the spirit and fellowship of a tight military team. Whoever these folks are dissing the show I have news for you...women play vital roles in our armed services. The contribution here is fairly accurate from what I understand. This is entertaining, it's patriotic and it honors the men and women in the front lines of the war on terror. I also appreciate that it attempts to highlight the sacrifices of the family members supporting our servicemen and servicewomen. As a veteran and the father of two servicemen, I thank CBS for a pretty solid and interesting show. programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Nakon što putnike privatnog aviona na letu iz New Orleansa za Washington netko ubije otrovom, svi dokazi ukazuju na nestaloga chefa, Abbyna brata Lucu (Tyler Ritter). Gibbs i washingtonski tim rade... Nakon što putnike privatnog aviona na letu iz New Orleansa za Washington netko ubije otrovom, svi dokazi ukazuju na nestaloga chefa, Abbyna brata Lucu (Tyler Ritter). Gibbs i washingtonski tim rade zajedno s Prideom i timom iz New Orleansa da bi locirali Lucu i odredili zašto je netko uzeo za metu privatnu tehnološku tvrtku, u prvom dijelu posebnog dvosatnog kombiniranoga događaja. Nakon što putnike privatnog aviona na letu iz New Orleansa za Washington netko ubije otrovom, svi dokazi ukazuju na nestaloga chefa, Abbyna brata Lucu (Tyler Ritter). Gibbs i washingtonski tim rade zajedno s Prideom i timom iz New Orleansa da bi locirali Lucu i odredili zašto je netko uzeo za metu privatnu tehnološku tvrtku, u prvom dijelu posebnog dvosatnog kombiniranoga događaja. Dok specijalni agent Pride i tim iz New Orleansa istražuju ruskoga agenta spavača koji je bio umiješan s Abbynim bratom Lucom (Tyler Ritter), Sebastian leti u Washington da bi se udružio s Abby na forenzici slučaja. Također, Bishop vozi kroz noć da bi dostavila paket i radila na slučaju s timom iz New Orleansa.

The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"timmurphy-2"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Solid Show","reviewBody":"Look...no network TV show is going to be totally accurate. This isn't a documentary. I was a JAG and that TV show wasn't even close to being accurate. But it WAS entertaining. And, like this show, it captures the spirit and fellowship of a tight military team. Whoever these folks are dissing the show I have news for you...women play vital roles in our armed services. The contribution here is fairly accurate from what I understand. This is entertaining, it's patriotic and it honors the men and women in the front lines of the war on terror.
