programme.title: Terminator Genisys
Terminator: Geneza
programme.desc:
Terminator Genisys: Directed by Alan Taylor. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Jason Clarke, Emilia Clarke, Jai Courtney. When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1340138/","name":"Terminator Genisys","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM1NTc0NzE4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDkyNjQ1NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1340138/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"prospectus_capricornium"},"dateCreated":"2015-07-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Way Below James Cameron's Terminator","reviewBody":"The newest entry to the Terminator franchise, strives with towering efforts to reclaim the glory of its two James Cameron-directed predecessors, but miserably fails to deliver even a faint hint of wit and sense, in the wake of its convoluted confusion-infested time-travel narrative.

In this fifth installment, ill-wittedly conceived and called GENISYS, The Terminator is definitely back, but his legacy is dead, butchered to bits of rusty metal junks through lazy and uncreative reinvention of its original source material. The timeline is set back to 1984. Skynet sends its own terminator from 2029, to kill Sarah Connor (Emilia Clarke), mother of future subversive leader of the resistance, John Connor (Jason Clarke). Consequently, a human, Kyle Reese (Jai Courtney) is also sent to stop the terminator, in humanity's desperate hope to save their species. At the time, Sarah is already being protected by her guardian terminator (Arnold Schwarzenegger), whose reasons of arriving in her time, is seemingly set to be never known.

Time-travel has always been a fascinating subject, and it in such fashion that Terminator: Genisys, attempts to build its own stronghold in the mold of the first two films. The take assumes an interesting onset, depicting an apocalyptic future where machines lord over the human minority, but it spirals down to fatal loops of nonsensical uncreatively-staged retreads when the what can be considered the inception of human salvation (Schwarzenegger's Terminator's arrival), begins. Once the deadly cat-and-mouse chases spin out of control, confusion begins, and the film itself, can't be bothered to clear off heads as it totally busy itself to trying to awe-inspire spectators, with elaborately-constructed action setpieces, teeming with CGI-mastered explosions, pursuits, and fight scenes. There's no denying that such attempt is carried out with colossal success, but the audience would inevitably find appreciating the feat, difficult and pointless . The proceedings are sutured into recreations of some iconic scenes of the original movies, while also devising its own, at the same time. But even with all these efforts, GENISYS still fails to generate sustained interest. The result of its motives manages to hit some of the nostalgic beats of the franchise, but tepid one-liners and confusing paradoxes would drag down its capacity to last. It is also by these narrative defects that interest is being stripped off its key players, making the audience barely care about the characters and the imminence of their extinction. This is why Genisys is way below the glory of its predecessors--the dread is barely present, and fear is forced, thus ineffective.

There is a screaming irony that bursts at the heels of this attempt to reinvigorate the sagging Terminator series: The Terminator (Schwarzenegger) returns to the past to save the whole of humankind, but the mess that is GENISYS, murders the franchise. 5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":268924,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2015-07-08","keywords":"cyborg,future,sarah connor,time machine,human versus cyborg","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1249751321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM1MTg5OTExOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM0OTEzNTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM1MTg5OTExOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODM0OTEzNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When John Connor, leader of the human resistance, sends Sgt. Kyle Reese back to 1984 to protect Sarah Connor and safeguard the future, an unexpected turn of events creates a fractured timeline. Now, Sgt. Reese finds himself in a new and unfamiliar version of the past, where he is faced with unlikely allies, including the Guardian, dangerous new enemies, and an unexpected new mission: To reset the future..."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0164809/","name":"Jason Clarke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3592338/","name":"Emilia Clarke"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0851930/","name":"Alan Taylor"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323215/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0436164/","name":"Laeta Kalogridis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527261/","name":"Patrick Lussier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000116/","name":"James Cameron"}],"duration":"PT2H6M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
Život ili nešto slično
programme.desc:
Life or Something Like It: Directed by Stephen Herek. With Angelina Jolie, Edward Burns, Tony Shalhoub, Christian Kane. A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0282687/","name":"Life or Something Like It","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI3NjY5NTU3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMTcwNDU3._V1_.jpg","description":"A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0282687/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moviewizguy"},"dateCreated":"2007-09-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"I Got Some Satisfaction! Because I Got Some! Because I Got Some!","reviewBody":"A reporter, Lanie Kerrigan, interviews a psychic homeless man (Shalhoub) for a fluff piece about a football game's score. Instead, he tells her that her life has no meaning, and is going to end in just a few days.

The moral of this story has been told ever single time from "It's a Wonderful Life", to "Last Holiday", even to "Click". Each of these movies have always won me over because I love moral stories and I certainly love this movie!

Sure, you've seen this so many times before. Sure, it's filled with clichéd, Sure, it's predictable what's going to happen before it happens. But it's a feel good movie. It puts a smile on your face when it ends. Don't go on the movie too hard.

I loved the performance by Angelina Jolie. The supporting characters give us some laughs along the way, although the film isn't too funny but more like a drama. I like the score for the film. I liked the film a lot but not as much as I thought it would be. Still, it was a pretty good film if you like moral movies. IMDb data; ttnr: 0282687, Title: Life or Something Like It, --- Description: Life or Something Like It: Directed by Stephen Herek. With Angelina Jolie, Edward Burns, Tony Shalhoub, Christian Kane. A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0282687/","name":"Life or Something Like It","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI3NjY5NTU3NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMTcwNDU3._V1_.jpg","description":"A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0282687/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"moviewizguy","dateCreated":"2007-09-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"I Got Some Satisfaction! Because I Got Some! Because I Got Some!","reviewBody":"A reporter, Lanie Kerrigan, interviews a psychic homeless man (Shalhoub) for a fluff piece about a football game's score. Instead, he tells her that her life has no meaning, and is going to end in just a few days.

The moral of this story has been told ever single time from "It's a Wonderful Life", to "Last Holiday", even to "Click". Each of these movies have always won me over because I love moral stories and I certainly love this movie!

Sure, you've seen this so many times before. Sure, it's filled with clichéd, Sure, it's predictable what's going to happen before it happens. But it's a feel good movie. It puts a smile on your face when it ends. Don't go on the movie too hard.

I loved the performance by Angelina Jolie. The supporting characters give us some laughs along the way, although the film isn't too funny but more like a drama. I like the score for the film. I liked the film a lot but not as much as I thought it would be. Still, it was a pretty good film if you like moral movies. "Live everyday like it will be your last."","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2002-04-26","keywords":"homeless man,alternative reality,prophecy,life and death battle,superstition","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Life or Something Like It","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2446590745","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIyNjY3N2ItMjllMS00ODJiLWI4NDktNTcwMjYzOGRhODVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIyNjY3N2ItMjllMS00ODJiLWI4NDktNTcwMjYzOGRhODVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001401/","name":"Angelina Jolie","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0122653/","name":"Edward Burns","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001724/","name":"Tony Shalhoub"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0378893/","name":"Stephen Herek"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0791806/","name":"John Scott Shepherd","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0828342/","name":"Dana Stevens"],"duration":"PT1H43M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sahara
Sahara
programme.desc: Sahara: Directed by Breck Eisner. With Jude Akuwudike, Mark Aspinall, Rakie Ayola, Christopher Bello. Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0318649/","name":"Sahara","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExOTM4NDUzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTgzNzczMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the "Ship of Death" in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0318649/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"buiger"},"dateCreated":"2007-12-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pure escapism... but what's wrong with that?","reviewBody":"This movie is definitely not a masterpiece. The screenplay is dumb. The acting is to say the least, average. The story is preposterous. Yet, as Ebert nicely put it, "I enjoyed this movie on its own dumb level, which must mean (I am forced to conclude) in my own dumb way". Yes, this is a film you should watch with your brain switched comfortably to the 'Off' position, a nice cold beer on the table and a bag of popcorn in your lap. When you come to think about it though, isn't that what movies are supposed to be all about in the first place?\n\nP.S. One thing worth mention though is the excellent cinematography. The movie is a wonderful African picture book, which definitely helps the overall experience.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":95772,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2005-04-20","keywords":"beach,evil man,good versus evil,bare chested male,disguise","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sahara","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2089091353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdlYjVlYjAtZTc2Ny00NzJjLWFlYjUtM2YyZjY3MjYyNGIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdlYjVlYjAtZTc2Ny00NzJjLWFlYjUtM2YyZjY3MjYyNGIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Paramount Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000190/","name":"Matthew McConaughey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004851/","name":"Penélope Cruz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001872/","name":"Steve Zahn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252135/","name":"Breck Eisner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129170/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0145519/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193774/","name":"Clive Cussler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0232776/","name":"Thomas Dean Donnelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0649191/","name":"Joshua Oppenheimer"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Letters from Iwo Jima
Pisma s Iwo Jime
programme.desc: Letters from Iwo Jima: Directed by Clint Eastwood. With Ken Watanabe, Kazunari Ninomiya, Tsuyoshi Ihara, Ryô Kase. The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0498380/","name":"Letters from Iwo Jima","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NzgwODI4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg3OTA0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0498380/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Asa_Nisi_Masa2"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Over 60 years on, traditional WW2 villains are finally allowed to be human","reviewBody":"Not having seen Flags of Our Fathers, I'll be unable to make any comparison to its companion-movie. Even on its own Letter to Iwo Jima could be seen as representing the new tendency to "humanise" what were until recently the traditional WW2 villains from an Anglosaxon point of view. History tends to be written by those on the winning side - hence, we have had decades of inhuman German war machines, cowardly Italians and unspeakably cruel Japanese. Now, over 60 years since WW2, it has become acceptable - nay, the done thing if you have a conscience, to humanise the losers and show even the winners as fallible and even individually despicable (***SPOILER:*** see the American soldier who shoots the two Japanese prisoners who've deliberately given themselves over. ***END OF SPOILER***). Letters to Iwo Jima clearly has its heart in the right place: it wants to be objective, above and beyond anything else. And it is. Japanese soldiers have mothers, adorable young pregnant wives in pretty kimonos and sons they write loving letters to. We empathise with them no less than we have with all those American soldiers in an endless string of war movies. Technically, Letters is a well-made movie. It's also genuinely moving in parts - you do end up caring for most of the main players. For my personal taste, though, it spells things out too much and too often. Still, for something produced by Mr Manipulative Spielberg and co-written by Paul "Crash" Haggis, I was impressed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":158832,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-02-21","keywords":"world war two,1940s,japanese,imperial japan,blood splatter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Memorable Military Moments in Film","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi584302873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxYjVlMzEtYWRiNC00ZDY2LWE1OGEtZTE1YzI0YTJiZWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1pYnJ5YW50._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxYjVlMzEtYWRiNC00ZDY2LWE1OGEtZTE1YzI0YTJiZWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQW1pYnJ5YW50._V1_.jpg","description":"From 'Saving Private Ryan' to 'Apocalypse Now,' here's a look back at some of the most memorable moments in military films."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0913822/","name":"Ken Watanabe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0632497/","name":"Kazunari Ninomiya"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0407296/","name":"Tsuyoshi Ihara"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000142/","name":"Clint Eastwood"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010258/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2111875/","name":"Iris Yamashita"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0353673/","name":"Paul Haggis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2362326/","name":"Tadamichi Kuribayashi"}],"duration":"PT2H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Flight of Fury
Smrtonosni let
programme.desc:
Flight of Fury: Directed by Michael Keusch. With Steven Seagal, Steve Toussaint, Angus MacInnes, Mark Bazeley. John is sent in to recover a stolen Stealth Bomber. His trusty sidekick Rojar and ever faithful Jessica fight the rebel forces of Banansistan, led by the vivacious Ellianna." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0783518/","name":"Flight of Fury","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyMTU3ODIyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjQ3NjAwNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"John is sent in to recover a stolen Stealth Bomber. His trusty sidekick Rojar and ever faithful Jessica fight the rebel forces of Banansistan, led by the vivacious Ellianna.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0783518/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ODDBear"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Never takes off","reviewBody":"Who would have thought that a Steven Seagal movie would employ loads of stock footage in it? Not me, not in 2001 at least when I last saw Big Steve on the big screen in the terrific "Exit Wounds".

"Flight of Fury" is hokey entertainment at best. The stock footage is painfully obvious and (probably) used to make the film look bigger. The story is awfully thin and it took Seagal and another dude to pen it. The fight scenes are uninspired and the gun play is fairly pedestrian. The flight scenes were far better some twenty years ago in "Top Gun" and the acting not very good. In fact, Old Steve mumbles his lines in such a relaxed manner that I expected him to fall asleep every now and then.

Despite all it's faults; "Flight of Fury" isn't all that painful to sit through. It moves along pretty well, the one on one fight with Steve at the end is well played out and an extra star must be awarded for his best physical form in years. There's even a lesbian scene here (completely out of the blue and pointless) but they're always quite the eye candy.

His trusty sidekick Rojar and ever faithful Jessica fight the rebel forces of Banansistan, led by the vivacious Ellianna." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0783518/","name":"Flight of Fury","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyMTU3ODIyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjQ3NjAwNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"John is sent in to recover a stolen Stealth Bomber. His trusty sidekick Rojar and ever faithful Jessica fight the rebel forces of Banansistan, led by the vivacious Ellianna.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0783518/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ODDBear","dateCreated":"2010-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Never takes off","reviewBody":"Who would have thought that a Steven Seagal movie would employ loads of stock footage in it? Not me, not in 2001 at least when I last saw Big Steve on the big screen in the terrific "Exit Wounds".

"Flight of Fury" is hokey entertainment at best. The stock footage is painfully obvious and (probably) used to make the film look bigger. The story is awfully thin and it took Seagal and another dude to pen it. The fight scenes are uninspired and the gun play is fairly pedestrian. The flight scenes were far better some twenty years ago in "Top Gun" and the acting not very good. In fact, Old Steve mumbles his lines in such a relaxed manner that I expected him to fall asleep every now and then.

Despite all it's faults; "Flight of Fury" isn't all that painful to sit through. It moves along pretty well, the one on one fight with Steve at the end is well played out and an extra star must be awarded for his best physical form in years. There's even a lesbian scene here (completely out of the blue and pointless) but they're always quite the eye candy.

All in all, not a good movie by any means but for fans of Steve it may be worth the hour and a half on a slow night.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4025,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-02-20","keywords":"low budget,pilot,terrorist,bomber,street shootout","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Flight of Fury","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2913403161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2NkNThjZmItYmJmNy00NDAyLTg4MDctNWZmOTRjM2UwYzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2NkNThjZmItYmJmNy00NDAyLTg4MDctNWZmOTRjM2UwYzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000219/","name":"Steven Seagal","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063303/","name":"Mark Bazeley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0869750/","name":"Steve Toussaint"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0450661/","name":"Michael Keusch"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020879/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0097598/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003653/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000219/","name":"Steven Seagal","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1546172/","name":"Joe Halpin"],"duration":"PT1H38M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Batman: Hallouini i gjatë, Pjesa I
programme.desc: Një vrasje brutale ditën e Hallouinit shtyn Batmanin të bashkojë forcat me dy ligjvënësit e vetëm të pakorruptuar të qytetit, për të rrëzuar familjen e krimit, Falcone. Por kur më shumë vdekje ndodhin gjatë festave, bëhet e qartë se ata kanë të bëjnë gjit.
programme.category: Vizatimor
aksion
krim

programme.title: Legjenda e shpatave fluturuese
programme.desc: Jet Li, Xun Zhou. Në kohën e dinastisë Ming, një grup plaçkitësish përdorin një hotel në shketëtirë si maskim për të kërkuar për një qytet të artë. Por planet e tyre rrezikojnë të shkatërrohen me ardhjen e një bukurosheje.
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Në mendjen e errët
programme.desc: Tom Sizemore. Pasi një vajzë e re, nga viktimë kthehet në të akuzuar, babai i saj përpiqet të vendosë vetë drejtësi, por çdo gjurmë pafajësie është fshirë nga policë të korruptuar...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Zodiaku: Shenjat e Apokalipsit
programme.desc: Kur arkeologët zbulojnë një objekt të lashtë, katastrofa natyrore nisin të shkatërrojnë globin. Një shkencëtar garon me kohën për të deshifruar simbolet e objektit, që tregojnë se civilizimi i lashtë na e ka lënë zgjidhjen për të shpëtuar botën.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Një e shtënë
programme.desc: Kevin Sorbo, Nichelle Aiden, Matthew Reese. Në Tokën e pushtuar nga jashtëtokësorët, një snajper profesionist bllokohet pas vijës së armikut. Tani i vetëm ai duhet të kujdeset jo vetëm për veten, por edhe për një jashtëtokësore bukuroshe.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Maska e hekurt
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jeremy Irons, John Malkovich. Një përshtatje e klasikut të Aleksander Dyma. Aventura më e rrezikshme e Musketierëve, ka të bëjë çlirimin e një të burgosuri misterioz mbi fytyren e të cilit rëndon një maskë e hekurt.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Labirinti 2: Toka e përzhitur
programme.desc: Dylan O'Brien, Kaya Scodelario. Grupi i të rinjve që i mbijetoi labirintit, këtë herë përballet me rreziqe të reja, në një tokë të përzhitur dhe me pengesa të paimagjinueshme...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Ushtarë e Shenjtorë 2:Misioni Berlin
programme.desc: Corbin Allred, David Nibley. Ne fundin e Luftës së Dytë Botërore, 3 ushtarë që hidhen me parashutë pas vijës së armikut bien në pritë dhe pasi takohen me disa luftëtarë të rezistencës, pranojnë t'i ndihmojnë për të shpëtuar shokët e tyre.
programme.category: Action War

programme.title: Grusht global
programme.desc: C.Owen, N.Watts. Një agjent i Interpolit dhe një Zv. Prokurore janë te vendosur të vënë përpara drejtësisë një nga bankat më të fuqishme të botës, e përfshirë në trafikun e armëve drejtuar nga një nga organizatat më të mëdha kriminale në botë.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Murgu që zbriste nga mali
programme.desc: Pasi dëbohet nga tempulli ku jetonte, një murg i ri përdor aftësite e tij në arte marciale për të mbijetuar në botën e jashtme dhe pasi i perfeksionon përmes një libri sekretesh, detyrohet të përfshihet në një betejë të rrezikshme.
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Forcat Elitë-Shiu i prillit
programme.desc: Luke Goss, Ryan Guzman. Terroristë brenda Amerikës, kanë planifikuar sulme të shumta dhe fati i mijëra njerëzve është në duart e një skuadre speciale, që duhet të ndalë rrezikun përpara se të jetë shumë vonë.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Kingsman: Shërbimi Sekret
programme.desc: Colin Firth, Samuel L. Jackson. Ndërkohë që një gjeni teknologjie kërcënon botën, nje agjenci sekrete rekruton një të ri problematik por premtues dhe e fut në programin stërvitor super të vështirë...
programme.category: Aksion
komedi

programme.title: X men II
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen, Halle Berry. Njerëzit X bashkohen për të zbuluar vrasësin që ka tentuar t'i marrë jetën presidentit, ndërkohë që Akademia mutante sulmohet nga forcat ushtarake.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Batman: Hallouini i gjatë, Pjesa II
programme.desc: Vrasësi i njohur si "Holiday" vazhdon të përndjekë familjen e krimit, Falkone, ndërsa një klasë e re kriminelësh po fuqizohet në qytetin e Gothamit. Vigjilenti Batmani ka filluar të ketë dyshimet e para se kush mund të jetë vrasësi që po terrorizon të gji.
programme.category: Vizatimor
aksion
krim

programme.title: Çmimi i suksesit
programme.desc: Kur disa aktorë të stërvitur në arte marciale janë në prag të suksesit në Hollivud, një regjisor i detyron të marrin pjesë në një garë vdekjeprurëse që zhvillohet në gjithë Los Anxhelosin.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Grabitqari
programme.desc: 2018. Boyd Holbrook, Sterling K. Brown, Olivia Munn. Grabitqarët e universit janë bërë më të zgjuar dhe më vdekjeprurës. Kur një djalë i thërret aksidentalisht në Tokë, vetëm një grup ish-ushtarësh dhe një shkencëtare mund të shpëtojnë njerëzimin.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
aksion

programme.title: Harley Davidson/Malboro Man
programme.desc: M.Rourke, D.Johnson. Motoçiklisti Harli dhe kauboji Malborou mësojnë se një mik i vjetër do të humbasë lokalin, pasi një banke do të ndërtojë aty një kompleks të ri. Prandaj ata do të grabisin banken, por jo gjithçka do të shkoje sipas planit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Epoka e akullit
programme.desc: Një tërmet i fuqishëm çan pllakën tektonike në Arabi duke sjellë mot të keq dhe temperatura të akullta. Një familje me pushime në Egjipt do të përpiqet të përballojë uljen e shpejtë të temperaturave, që paralajmërojnë një tjeter epokë akulli.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Zjarrfikësit e Hong Kongut
programme.desc: Një zjarr i madh kërcënon Hong Kongun dhe besimin brenda një grupi zjarrëfikësish. Politika, rivaliteti dhe dyshimi futen në lojë ndërsa merren vendime të dyshimta, injorohen paralajmërimet, dhe shokët bien...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Kolumbiania
programme.desc: Zoe Saldana , Jordi Molla . Pasi bëhet dëshmitare e vrasjes së prindërve, një vajzë e re kolumbiane kthehet në një vrasëse profesioniste. Tani misioni i saj është vetëm një, të gjejë dhe të ndëshkojë pa asnjë mëshirë përgjegjësit e krimit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Shpejtësi për mbijetesë
programme.desc: John Cusack, Thomas Jane. Një ish-pilot garash, merret peng nga një kriminel, për të qenë shoferi i tij në një vjedhje spektakolare. Një vjedhje që i vendos në shënjestrën e policëve dhe të mafiozëve.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Rastësisht hajdut
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves, James Caan, Vera Farmiga. Pasi lirohet nga burgu për një vjedhje që nuk e ka kryer, një njeri planifikon të grabisë të njëjtën bankë për të cilën u dënua...
programme.category: Krim

programme.title: Pleasantville
programme.desc: Tobey Maguire, Reese Witherspoon. Film kandidat për trofeun Oskar. Një adoleshent dhe motra e tij, transportohen pas në kohë nga vitet 1990 në një program televiziv të viteve 1950, ku gjithçka është perfekte..
programme.category: Fantazi

programme.title: Dangal-Shpresa për fitoren e m
programme.desc: 2016.Filmi indian fitues i 23 çmimeve kinematografike. Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Pasi dështoi të fitonte medalien e artë për vendin e tij, një ish mundës betohet të realizojë ëndrrën duke stërvitur në sportin e mundjes dy vajzat e tij.
programme.category: Biografi
sport

programme.title: Dashuri në akull 4
programme.desc: Pas tërheqjes nga patinazhi në akull, një vajzë e re bindet nga një patinator për t'u rikthyer. Por sa më shumë njihen aq më shumë shtohen ndjenjat për njëri tjetrin dhe kjo mund të rrezikojë ëndrrën e tyre të madhe...
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Vendi i bukur
programme.desc: Nick Nolte, Thu Anh. Lufta e Vietnamit s'mbaroi kurrë për ata qe qenë protagoniste. Kjo është historia e Binh, fëmijë i mëkatit amerikano-vietnamez. Jetonte me gjysherit, por e dëbojnë nga fshati dhe arratiset në Amerikë për të gjetur babanë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Ndodhi për të qeshur
programme.desc: 17 vjeçari Kreig, në gjendje depresioni, sapo ka mbërritur vullnetarisht në spital, në repartin psikiatrik për të rritur. Aty njihet me një grup pacientësh të marrë, por gazmorë, plot kurajë dhe energji që e ndihmojnë të gjejë vetëveten.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Xixëllonja në oborr
programme.desc: Ryan Reynolds, Willem Dafoe, Julia Roberts. Duhet të ishte një festë, por u shndërrua në një tragjedi. Një vdekje që vë në provë lidhjet familjare. Portreti i një familje që përballet me të shkuarën dhe fillon të shohë drejt të ardhmes.
programme.category: Portret familjar

programme.title: Tre njerëz në kërkim të fatit
programme.desc: Rachel McAdams, Tim Robbins, Michael Peña. Tre ushtarë amerikanë të sapo kthyer në atdhe, detyrohen të udhëtojnë së bashku. Një udhëtim ku përballen me marrëdhënie dhe shpresa të shkatërruara, por ndoshta zbulojnë edhe fatin e gjithsecilit.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Uini Mandela
programme.desc: Nën interpretimin e shkëlqyer të fitueses së çmimit Oskar, Jennifer Hudson dhe kandidatit për çmimin Oskar, Terrence Howard vjen një histori epike dashurie, sakrifice dhe kurajoje. Historia e vërtetë e bashkëshortes së Nelson Mandelës...
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Patch Adams
programme.desc: Bazuar ne historine e vertete te nje studenti ekstravagant te mjekesise (Robin Williams) qe vuri ne rrezik karrieren e vet per te vertetuar teorine e tij se e qeshura zgjat jeten dhe eshte ilaçi me i mire.
programme.category: Histori e vërtetë

programme.title: Nata e parë
programme.desc: Saoirse Ronan. Bazuar në romanin e Ian McEwan. Angli, 1962. Dashuria e sinqertë e një çifi të ri përballet me çështje të lirisë seksuale dhe me presionin shoqëror, duke e bërë natën e parë të martesës të vështirë dhe fatale.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Fotografia
programme.desc: 2020. Issa Rae. Zbulimi i një fotografie të fshehur, dërgon Maen në një kërkim përgjigjesh në lidhje me të kaluarën e nënës së saj dhe ndez një romancë të fuqishme dhe të papritur.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Për një shtëpi
programme.desc: Imogen Poots. Një nënë e re zhvendoset nga një motel në tjetrin me të dashurin problematik dhe djalin 8-vjeçar. Tek përpiqen të mbijetojnë në një mënyrë a në një tjetër, një komunitet me shtëpi levizëse i ofron atyre një alternativë jetese.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: 90 minuta në parajsë
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen, Kate Bosworth. Bazuar në një histori të jashtëzakonshme dhe të vërtetë! I shpallur i vdekur pas një aksidenti me makinë, kleriku Don Pajpër zgjohet pas 90 minutash dhe thotë se gjatë kësaj kohe ndodhej në parajsë.
programme.category: Dramë e krishterë

programme.title: Shteti i lirë Xhons
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey. Fymëzuar nga ngjarje të vërteta! Gjatë luftës civile në Amerikë, fermeri Njuton Najt, vihet në krye të një force rebele me fermerë e skllevër për të krijuar një shtet fare të vogël brenda Konfederatës.
programme.category: Dramë
luftë

programme.title: Kristina
programme.desc: Rebecca Hall. Jeta e Christine Chubbuck, gazetare televizive në vitet '70, e cila luftoi me depresionin dhe me zhgënjimet profesionale, ndërsa përpiqej të bënte karrierë. Ajo kreu vetvrasje gjatë një edicioni informativ të drejtpërdrejtë.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Guxo të ëndërrosh
programme.desc: Bazuar në jetën irlandezes Meri Rejnolds, një grua që luftoi për të sjellë stilin e saj aspak konvencional të frymëzuar nga natyra e egër, në garën më prestigjoze të kopshtarisë në Mbretërinë e Bashkuar.
programme.category: Dramë
romancë

programme.title: Brajan Benks
programme.desc: Aldis Hodge, Greg Kinnear. Historia frymëzuese e Brajan Benksit, yll futbolli amerikan, jeta e të cilit përmbyset kur dënohet për një krim që nuk e ka kryer. Kjo është lufta e tij drejtësi dhe për të realizuar ëndrrën e kthimit në fushë.
programme.category: Biografi
dramë

programme.title: Arushi Brigsbi
programme.desc: 2017. Arushi Brigsbi, është një program televiziv i prodhuar për një person të vetëm, Xhejmsin. Kur programi papritur mbaron, Xhejms bën të pamundurën për ta përfunduar historinë.
programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Fëmija i së keqes
programme.desc: Elizabeth Banks. Pas shumë perpjekjeve për të pasur fëmijë, ëndrra e një çifti realizohet kur në derën e tyre shfaqet një foshnje misterioze. Por kur djaloshi të rritet, të gjithë ata pranë tij, do ta gjejnë veten në një rrezik të madh.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Në kurth me aligatorët
programme.desc: Kaya Scodelario. Ndërsa uragani i kategorisë 5 vërshon drejt Florides, Haley nixton të gjejë të atin, të cilin e gjen të bllokuar në bodrumin e shtëpisë. Ndërsa niveli i ujit rritet, ata zbulojnë se stuhia është problemi i tyre më i vogël.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Përpara se të iki
programme.desc: 12 shkurti, është thjesht një ditë tjetër për Samantën, derisa kuptohet se është dita e saj e fundit. E bllokuar për të ripërjetuar ditën e fundit, ajo duhet të zbulojë misterin e vdekjes dhe gjithçka që po humbet përpara se të iki.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Gruaja që ecën përpara
programme.desc: Jessica Chastain. Piktorja Nju Jorkeze Catherine Weldon, udhëton drejt Dakotës në vitet 1880, për të pikturuar portretin një udhëheqësi të madh indian. Ajo do të bëhet përkrahëse e të drejtave të fisit indian dhe luftës për tokat e tyre.
programme.category: Dramë
biografi

programme.title: Duhet të kishit ikur
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon, Amanda Seyfried. Pushimet e përkryera të një çifti me probleme shtrembërohen në një makth të tmerrshëm kur ngjarje të së kaluarës dalin në sipërfaqe dhe një forcë e keqe në shtëpinë e pushimit nuk pranon t'i lërë ata të largohen.
programme.category: Horror psikologjik

programme.title: Heshtja
programme.desc: Stanley Tucci, Kiernan Shipka. Ndërsa bota është nën sulmin e krijesave vdekjeprurëse që gjuajnë prenë e tyre nga zhurmat, një adoleshente shurdhe dhe familja e saj kërkojnë strehim jashtë qytetit dhe përballen me një kult misterioz.
programme.category: Horror
thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Kur të rriten fëmijët
programme.desc: 2019.Patricia Arquette, Felicity Huffman. Tri mikesha të lëna pas dore nga djemtë e tyre të rritur, nisen për Nju Jork për t'u riafruar me ta. Por, kur prindërit ndërhyjnë në jetën e fëmijëve të tyre, nuk mund t'i parashikosh kurrë pasojat...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Në baladën e dashurisë
programme.desc: Pas disa fatkeqësive në jetë, një balerinë e sapo divorcuar dhe një i ve e zemërthyer, arrijnë të rindërtojnë jetët e tyre kur bëhen partnerë për të fituar një konkurs vallëzimi.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Film pa zë
programme.desc: Mel Brooks. Parodi e filmave pa zë. Një regjisor, karriera e të cilit ka perënduar, kërkon të realizojë një film pa zë edhe pse ka mbi 40 vjet që nuk prodhohen më.
programme.category: Parodi

programme.title: Shtëpi, e ëmbla shtëpi
programme.desc: Ata janë një çift në kërkim të një shtepie, por çmimet e shtrenjta janë të papërballueshme për ta...derisa takojne 1 plakë qe u shet shtepine e saj...me nje çmim qesharak. Vetëm se ka një kleçkë. Sapo vë kemben brenda, shtëpia fillon të shperbehet.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Superfantoci
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio, Liù Bosisio. Fantoci, njeriu më i pafat në histori vazhdon me aventurat dhe ngatërresat që e ndjekin kudo, që nga krijimi si njeriu i parë mbi tokë e deri kohët moderne...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Leksione anatomie
programme.desc: M. Griffith, E Harris. 12 vjeçari, Frank dhe dy miqtë e tij vendosin se ka ardhur koha të shohin femrën e parë nudo. Por pas një sërë telashesh dhe asnjë rezultat ata njihen me një këcimtare erotike, që do të ndryshojë gjithçka.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Zoti Dids
programme.desc: Prodhim i vitit 2002. Adam Sandler, Winona Ryder. Pasi trashëgon një pasuri shumë të madhe nga xhaxhai i tij, një i ri nga një qytet i vogël, do t'i mësojë shoqërisë së lartë se si shijohet jeta në të vërtetë...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Më në fund erdhe ti
programme.desc: Asa Butterfield, Maisie Williams. Një adoleshent hipokondriak përballet me frikën e tij ndaj vdekjes kur një vajzë adoleshente e sëmurë terminale, i kërkon ta ndihmojë të plotësojë listën e saj të guximshme të dëshirave.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: E lë kur të dua
programme.desc: Filmi debutues i regjisorit Sydney Sibilia. Me Edoardo Leo. Shtatë studiues universitar papritur të papunë, për të mbijetuar shpikin një drogë të re, qe u del jashtë kontrollit...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Miq pa kompromise
programme.desc: Chris Evans, Michelle Monaghan. I dashuruar menjëherë pas një vajze që takon në një festë, një skenarist fillon me të një lidhje platonike edhe pse ajo është e fejuar me dikë tjetër.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Puthje franceze
programme.desc: 1995. Regjia: Lawrence Kasdan; Aktorët:Meg Ryan, Kevin Kline. Kejti ndodhet në Paris per të rifituar zemrën e burrit të ëndrrave të saj. Tani për tani po jeton endrrën e saj më të keqe.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Organizatorja e dasmave
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez, Matthew McConaughey. Ajo eshte organizatorja me e mire e dasmave, ambicioze, e zellshme...por kesaj radhe fati do t'ia punoje, pasi do te dashurohet me dhendrin per te cilin po pergatit dasmen me te madhe te karrieres se saj.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Abraham Linkolni:
programme.desc: Benjamin Walker, Dominic Cooper. Historia fiktive e jetës sekrete së presidentit të 16-të të Amerikës. Abraham Lincoln, rrezikon çdo gje, në përpjekje për të ndalur vampirët gjakpirës, të cilët kanë në plan të krijojnë kombin e tyre...
programme.category: Gjahtari i Vampirëve

programme.title: 28 dite me vonë
programme.desc: Alex Palmer, Bindu De Stoppani. Një virus misterioz zhduk pjesën më të madhe të planetit dhe një grup të mbijetuarish perpiqen të shpetojnë racen njerëzore nga shfarosja.
programme.category: Horror
fantazi

programme.title: Fëmijët
programme.desc: Pushimet e shumëpritura kthehen në një makth të vërtetë për mbijetesë, kur fëmijët fillojnë të masakrojnë prindërit e tyre në mënyra të tmerrshme.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Zemër e egër
programme.desc: 2014. Bruce Greenwood, Brian Geraghty. Një adoleshente arratiset kur kushtet në shtëpinë e saj të re bëhen të padurueshme. E humbur në egërsinë e Alaksës, ajo miqësohet me një burrë, me shpresën e pashprehur se do ta ndihmojë të kthehet tek e ëma.
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.title: E ftohtë vjen nata
programme.desc: Alice Eve, Bryan Cranston. Një pronare hoteli dhe vajza e saj merren peng nga një kriminel thuajse i verbër, për ta ndihmuar që ai të rimarrë paratë e tij, të vjedhura bashkë me një polic të korruptuar...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Livandë
programme.desc: Pasi zbulon frakturat e vjetra në kafkën e saj, një fotografe që po rikuperohet nga amnezia, përndiqet gjithnjë e më shumë nga një sekret i errët fëmijërie.
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.title: Brave
Merida Hrabra
programme.desc:
Brave: Directed by Mark Andrews, Brenda Chapman, Steve Purcell. With Kelly Macdonald, Billy Connolly, Emma Thompson, Julie Walters. Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida (Kelly Macdonald) defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1217209/","name":"Brave","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzgwODk3ODA1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjU3NjQ0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida (Kelly Macdonald) defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1217209/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lovgrena"},"dateCreated":"2012-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"A quality change of fate for Pixar","reviewBody":"Everything about Brave is different from the Pixar norm, save the unequaled attention to detail and quality.

The Disney-Pixar animated feature focuses on Princess Merida as she searches for a way to change her fate. In a journey of magic, adventure and family, the fiery Scot is launched into the ranks of the elite Disney princesses. 

As odd and understandably foreign as the accents felt watching the early previews for the movie, the voice acting was executed following, creating very real characters that fit their animated molds perfectly. By the end of the movie, what once sounded foreign blended into the scenery and visuals to create a completely immersing environment.

In fact, amid the magic spells and tall tales of times gone by, it's the historical, Scottish feeling that made Marida's journey and transformation (and that of her mother) that much more tangible and familiar.

Underneath the folk-tale storyline lies the same life lessons that ring true for young and old. Though the movie heavily focuses on a mother- daughter relationship, it's not just for girls anymore than Mulan was. Merida is a true Disney princess, with gumption, heart and an uncanny connection with nature, but the story could have been told from a male perspective and rung just as true, making it easy to empathize with Pixar's first female lead.

As has been the case with almost every other one of their movies, the company has reinvented the standard for animated visuals. The environments are based on real Scottish landmarks, adding real depth to the story, and the colors are as bright as they are grounded, creating a wonderfully real world. Such visuals lend credence to the upcoming 3D re-release of Finding Nemo, though not much, but also show just how far the studio has come. 

All of the elements put together, Brave is a different sort of movie than many were expecting. More focused on a single pair and their quest together, not to mention darker by far, the story of Merida was a leap of faith for the once small studio. 

Many will have their doubts, left wanting another heart wrenching love story from Up or creative take on a beat to death genre like The Incredibles. That was never the purpose. Just as with every one of their award-winning films (Cars 2 notwithstanding), a new movie means a new chapter, new story and new style of film.

Taken for what it is, Brave is a remarkable step into a whole new style of movie, proving the creative teams at Pixar will continue to write their own fate.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":390617,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2012-08-15","keywords":"princess,mother daughter relationship,archery,female warrior,rebellious daughter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Families Legend","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi678863641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4OTM4NTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA4MDI3Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM4OTM4NTY5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA4MDI3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0531808/","name":"Kelly Macdonald"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175262/","name":"Billy Connolly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0028764/","name":"Mark Andrews"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0152312/","name":"Brenda Chapman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700760/","name":"Steve Purcell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0152312/","name":"Brenda Chapman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0028764/","name":"Mark Andrews"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700760/","name":"Steve Purcell"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Steve Jobs
Steve Jobs
programme.desc:
Steve Jobs: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Michael Fassbender, Kate Winslet, Seth Rogen, Jeff Daniels. Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2080374/","name":"Steve Jobs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NTA2MTEwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg4NzU2NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2080374/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AlsExGal"},"dateCreated":"2017-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"an abstract portrait of the man..","reviewBody":"... in that you can argue about almost every stroke in the painting, yet when you stand back a few feet from the work, you realize that this is a more accurate portrayal of Steve Jobs than any photograph could be.

For example, Michael Fassbender looks nothing like Steve Jobs did at any point in his adult life, sounds nothing like Steve Jobs did. Yet, by the end of the film you feel that you are looking right at the man. Why? Because every incident portrayed sounds EXACTLY like something Steve Jobs would have done or said even if the entire incident never happened.

Kate Winsett gave an Oscar worthy performance as Joanna Hoffman, Jobs' marketing expertise and confidante, if he had any confidante at all. She acts as his conscience, his anchor, yet she actually wasn't there for a third of the film. Hoffmann retired before Jobs went back to Apple. As for Seth Rogan as Steve Wosniak, what can I say. He blew me away as he stood toe to toe with Fassbender in a show down that took my breath away with its intensity, and he stole the entire scene from Fassbender, proving he is much more than just the comic relief of Judd Apatow films.

Jeff Daniels as the conventional CEO John Sculley, recruited by Jobs to deal with a most unconventional visionary in a pioneering industry, absolutely nails the part. The scene towards the middle of the film where Sculley and Jobs have it out is a work of art in itself of dialogue, editing, and acting, and the time shifting between the present and various pasts of their relationship is expertly done.

As for the plot? It takes place entirely at three product launches - the Mac in 1984, the NeXT computer in 1988, and the iMac in 1998, and the central theme is Jobs' relationship with his daughter Lisa, the paternity of whom he did not come to terms with for years. Of course, if Jobs had even one product launch like the ones in the film with everybody he's ever known approaching and reproaching him, Jobs would have had security like the secret service at every launch afterwards.

So don't approach this like a documentary, instead approach it like the art it was meant to be and I think you'll enjoy it greatly. And regardless of what others say, I think it gives the most humane portrayal of Jobs I've seen on film. Strongly recommended.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":163294,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-10-23","keywords":"computer,father daughter relationship,apple computer,dialogue driven,1990s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3424367385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyODU3MTA0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc4NjE4NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyODU3MTA0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc4NjE4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set backstage in the minutes before three iconic product launches spanning Jobs' career -- beginning with the Macintosh in 1984, and ending with the unveiling of the iMac in 1998 -- Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution to paint an intimate portrait of the brilliant man at its epicenter."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1055413/","name":"Michael Fassbender"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093765/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0815070/","name":"Aaron Sorkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410596/","name":"Walter Isaacson"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2080374/","name":"Steve Jobs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NTA2MTEwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg4NzU2NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution, to paint a portrait of the man at its epicenter. The story unfolds backstage at three iconic product launches, ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2080374/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"AlsExGal","dateCreated":"2017-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"an abstract portrait of the man..","reviewBody":"... in that you can argue about almost every stroke in the painting, yet when you stand back a few feet from the work, you realize that this is a more accurate portrayal of Steve Jobs than any photograph could be.

For example, Michael Fassbender looks nothing like Steve Jobs did at any point in his adult life, sounds nothing like Steve Jobs did. Yet, by the end of the film you feel that you are looking right at the man. Why? Because every incident portrayed sounds EXACTLY like something Steve Jobs would have done or said even if the entire incident never happened.

Kate Winsett gave an Oscar worthy performance as Joanna Hoffman, Jobs' marketing expertise and confidante, if he had any confidante at all. She acts as his conscience, his anchor, yet she actually wasn't there for a third of the film. Hoffmann retired before Jobs went back to Apple. As for Seth Rogan as Steve Wosniak, what can I say. He blew me away as he stood toe to toe with Fassbender in a show down that took my breath away with its intensity, and he stole the entire scene from Fassbender, proving he is much more than just the comic relief of Judd Apatow films.

Jeff Daniels as the conventional CEO John Sculley, recruited by Jobs to deal with a most unconventional visionary in a pioneering industry, absolutely nails the part. The scene towards the middle of the film where Sculley and Jobs have it out is a work of art in itself of dialogue, editing, and acting, and the time shifting between the present and various pasts of their relationship is expertly done.

As for the plot? It takes place entirely at three product launches - the Mac in 1984, the NeXT computer in 1988, and the iMac in 1998, and the central theme is Jobs' relationship with his daughter Lisa, the paternity of whom he did not come to terms with for years. Of course, if Jobs had even one product launch like the ones in the film with everybody he's ever known approaching and reproaching him, Jobs would have had security like the secret service at every launch afterwards.

So don't approach this like a documentary, instead approach it like the art it was meant to be and I think you'll enjoy it greatly. And regardless of what others say, I think it gives the most humane portrayal of Jobs I've seen on film. Strongly recommended.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":163294,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2015-10-23","keywords":"computer,father daughter relationship,apple computer,dialogue driven,1990s","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3424367385","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyODU3MTA0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc4NjE4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEyODU3MTA0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc4NjE4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set backstage in the minutes before three iconic product launches spanning Jobs' career -- beginning with the Macintosh in 1984, and ending with the unveiling of the iMac in 1998 -- Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution to paint an intimate portrait of the brilliant man at its epicenter.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1055413/","name":"Michael Fassbender","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0736622/","name":"Seth Rogen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093765/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0815070/","name":"Aaron Sorkin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410596/","name":"Walter Isaacson"],"duration":"PT2H2M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pregled proteklog tjedna s Johnom Oliverom
programme.desc: Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće. Jedna od najduhovitijih i najsvježijih osobnosti koja se posljednjih godina pojavila na TV-u, John Oliver, stiže na HBO u ovom serijalu koji daje aktualan pogled na tjedne vijesti, politiku i tekuće događaje. Svaka epizoda daje Oliveru jedinstvenu platformu odakle može nuditi svoje specifično gledište o svjetskim problemima uz razne posebne goste i segmente.

programme.title: Tangled
Vrlo zapetljana priča
programme.desc:
Tangled: Directed by Nathan Greno, Byron Howard. With Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy, Ron Perlman. The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0398286/","name":"Tangled","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxNDYxMjg0MjNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDcyNTk2OTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0398286/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"intelearts"},"dateCreated":"2011-01-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"My 354th Review: Excellent entertainment - really","reviewBody":"With jaw-dropping graphics and an abundance of heart this is simply what you would wish for in a fairy tale: memorable, magical, and magnificent.

We cannot remember the last time we saw a film that was simply so entertaining - there is almost nothing to complain about here in any way and much to praise from values to comedy to several scenes that were genuinely moving - this really is one of the best movies of the year and deserves its massive box office success.

If perhaps you are reluctant to see it as you think it will just rehash old Disney ideas or be unsuitable for small children I would say those are always my first concerns, but here for the first time in a very long time I can honestly say that here we have a film that holds its own integrity and so, even with the villain's death, you don't feel that it was put in to scare.

All in all, a magical, hilarious, witty, and very well thought through movie that deserves the Oscar that is surely coming to it - simply the best animated movie of the year as, more even than Toy Story 3, it rises beyond animation to make a wonderful heart-filled adventure that makes for very satisfying viewing indeed.

Thank you, Disney.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":426157,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-12-01","keywords":"rapunzel,based on fairy tale,disney,flower,female protagonist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tangled: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi385091865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzI2NDA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1OTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzI2NDA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1OTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The long-haired Princess Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but when she falls in love with a bandit who was passing by she must venture into the outside world for the first time to find him."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601553/","name":"Mandy Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157048/","name":"Zachary Levi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614220/","name":"Donna Murphy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1977355/","name":"Nathan Greno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0397174/","name":"Byron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342278/","name":"Jacob Grimm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342303/","name":"Wilhelm Grimm"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Britanija
programme.desc: Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Sada u svojoj uzbudljivoj trećoj sezoni, ova epska i vizionarska drama nastavlja pratiti rimsku invaziju na Britaniju. Nemilosrdni i lukavi general Aulo Plaucije odlučniji je no ikad da osvoji ovu mitsku zemlju na krajnjem rubu Rimskog Carstva. Sada je slomio i razbio moćne druide, ali njegova prava misija da zarobi i ubije Odabranu ostaje nedostižna. Uz snage koje se okupljaju protiv nje, Cait je ranjivija nego što misli. Skrhana događajima u drugoj sezoni, bori se sa svojim putom Odabrane - no možete li ikada zaista pobjeći od svoje sudbine?

programme.desc: Scenes from a Marriage: Created by Hagai Levi. With Jessica Chastain, Oscar Isaac, Sophia Kopera, Nicole Beharie. programme.title: Pride & Prejudice
Ponos i predrasude
programme.desc:
Pride & Prejudice: Directed by Joe Wright. With Keira Knightley, Talulah Riley, Rosamund Pike, Jena Malone. Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0414387/","name":"Pride & Prejudice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1NDQ3NTcyOTNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA0MzA4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0414387/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogerdarlington"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Three weddings and no funeral","reviewBody":"This quintessentially English film is utterly charming - a very traditional interpretation of Jane Austen's 1813 novel that manages to entertain, amuse and even move. First time director Joe Wright has worked with television playwright Deborah Moggach's script and a wonderful collection of mainly British actors to delight us. The versatile camera-work, luscious countryside, grand settings, period costumes, and atmospheric music are evidence of a work on which much love has been lavished.

At the heart of this triumph is the delightful 20 year old Keira Knightley as the assured and sharp Elizabeth Bennett, the second of five daughters looking to be married off by an anxious mother. Knightley's rise in the thespian firmament has been meteoric and this is her best performance to date in a role for which she is perfectly cast. Matthew MacFadyen is suitably brooding and gauche as Mr Darcy, but the cast list is enlivened with splendid British character actors, including Brenda Blethyn as Lizzie's irascible mother, Tom Hollander as a diminutive cleric seeking a wife, and Judi Dench as the formidable Lady Catherine, plus the Canadian Donald Sutherland (Lizzie's wise father).

This is a Georgian world in which social conventions present a veritable minefield for indiscretions or misunderstandings and in which a formal dance can be as intricate an occasion as international diplomacy. Pride and prejudice are only two of the obstacles to be overcome before inevitably true love brings Lizzie and her dark knight nose to nose (we don't even see a kiss). Passionate stuff indeed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":275936,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-05-10","keywords":"pride and prejudice,england,gentleman,bachelor,prejudice","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pride & Prejudice","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3045130521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Focus Features"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532193/","name":"Matthew Macfadyen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000950/","name":"Brenda Blethyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942504/","name":"Joe Wright"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595738/","name":"Deborah Moggach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000807/","name":"Jane Austen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Keira Knightley (role=Elizabeth Bennet), Talulah Riley (role=Mary Bennet), Rosamund Pike (role=Jane Bennet), Jena Malone (role=Lydia Bennet), Carey Mulligan (role=Kitty Bennet), Donald Sutherland (role=Mr. Bennet), Brenda Blethyn (role=Mrs. Bennet), Claudie Blakley (role=Charlotte Lucas), Sylvester Morand (role=Sir William Lucas), Simon Woods (role=Mr. Bingley), Kelly Reilly (role=Caroline Bingley), Matthew Macfadyen (role=Mr. Darcy)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0414387, Title: Pride & Prejudice, --- Description: Pride & Prejudice: Directed by Joe Wright. With Keira Knightley, Talulah Riley, Rosamund Pike, Jena Malone. Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0414387/","name":"Pride & Prejudice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1NDQ3NTcyOTNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA0MzA4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0414387/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"rogerdarlington","dateCreated":"2005-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Three weddings and no funeral","reviewBody":"This quintessentially English film is utterly charming - a very traditional interpretation of Jane Austen's 1813 novel that manages to entertain, amuse and even move. First time director Joe Wright has worked with television playwright Deborah Moggach's script and a wonderful collection of mainly British actors to delight us. The versatile camera-work, luscious countryside, grand settings, period costumes, and atmospheric music are evidence of a work on which much love has been lavished.

At the heart of this triumph is the delightful 20 year old Keira Knightley as the assured and sharp Elizabeth Bennett, the second of five daughters looking to be married off by an anxious mother. Knightley's rise in the thespian firmament has been meteoric and this is her best performance to date in a role for which she is perfectly cast. Matthew MacFadyen is suitably brooding and gauche as Mr Darcy, but the cast list is enlivened with splendid British character actors, including Brenda Blethyn as Lizzie's irascible mother, Tom Hollander as a diminutive cleric seeking a wife, and Judi Dench as the formidable Lady Catherine, plus the Canadian Donald Sutherland (Lizzie's wise father).

This is a Georgian world in which social conventions present a veritable minefield for indiscretions or misunderstandings and in which a formal dance can be as intricate an occasion as international diplomacy. Pride and prejudice are only two of the obstacles to be overcome before inevitably true love brings Lizzie and her dark knight nose to nose (we don't even see a kiss). Passionate stuff indeed.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":275936,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-05-10","keywords":"pride and prejudice,england,gentleman,bachelor,prejudice","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pride & Prejudice","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3045130521","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Focus Features","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532193/","name":"Matthew Macfadyen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000950/","name":"Brenda Blethyn"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942504/","name":"Joe Wright"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595738/","name":"Deborah Moggach","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000807/","name":"Jane Austen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"],"duration":"PT2H9M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
Kingsman: Tajna služba
programme.desc:
Kingsman: The Secret Service: Directed by Matthew Vaughn. With Adrian Quinton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong, Jonno Davies. A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2802144/","name":"Kingsman: The Secret Service","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTM3ZTllNzItNTNmOS00NzJiLTg1MWMtMjMxNDc0NmJhODU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2802144/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RealDuality"},"dateCreated":"2015-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Vaughn is Let Loose","reviewBody":"People will have interesting reactions to this film. All of Matthew Vaughn's movies have been good, and he was able to push it further with this one. I would call it an action comedy, but there is more of an emphasis on the action than the genre usually has. 

There are cool POV shots, and it gets you right into the thick of it. It mixes it up with some short moments where it doesn't cut so quickly, as well as a few long takes that are particular nice. The violence and comedy has a guttural component, which a person like me really enjoys, but it will throw some off. 

The film is a throwback to old spy flicks, while at the same time being a sort of parody. It is humorous throughout. Samuel L. Jackson plays an odd megalomaniac who makes you laugh more than shiver, which goes with the tone of the movie. It is nice to see Samuel L. in the role of a bad guy. I have no doubt that many will enjoy the henchwoman, who has a different element to her. Colin Firth fits in with the particularly suave spying; and, the newcomer playing the protagonist, Taron Egerton, handles both the action and comedy well. Mark Strong is always a good actor for movies with dark humor. It is fun, however those who are sensitive may have trouble enjoying it. It is not a film for everyone, but that makes it better for others. I personally think it is Vaughn's best work.

8.75","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":621422,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-01-29","keywords":"spy,female rear nudity,training,class differences,secret organization","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1901244185","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzk1MTc4NDE2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQxMjY1MzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzk1MTc4NDE2NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzQxMjY1MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A super-secret spy organization recruits an unrefined but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5473782/","name":"Taron Egerton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891216/","name":"Matthew Vaughn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0165404/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0541631/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0963359/","name":"Jane Goldman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0891216/","name":"Matthew Vaughn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2092839/","name":"Mark Millar"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="
